name: ABC
text:

name: ABC
text: President Trump is continuing to push a rosy outlook on the future of the coronavirus crisis, claiming "the virus is receding," just one day after Dr. Birx warned it's "extraordinarily widespread" as the U.S. enters "a new phase" of the pandemic. https://t.co/uhHjpAFd6U

text:

text: Sorry, boomers. Millennials and their younger siblings and children now make up a majority of the U.S. population, a new analysis finds. https://t.co/sKpY7xYm8Z

text:
